FuncDef:
The igmp command displays the IGMP view of the public network instance or VPN instance.
The undo igmp command deletes the IGMP view and all configurations in the IGMP view. The igmp command displays the IGMP view of the public network instance or VPN instance. The undo igmp command deletes the IGMP view and all configurations in the IGMP view. By default,no IGMP view is not enabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo: Before configuring IGMP parameters globally, you must run the igmp to enter the IGMP view of the public network instance or VPN instance.
